title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
January 18, 2019
On Friday, January 18, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 251, the “Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Standards Program Extension Act,” which extends, by 15 months, the Department of Homeland Security’s authority to administer the Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Standards Program.
